name: now-app
description: The native client for ZEIT's now

scripts.clean: chmod u+x dist && rm -rf node_modules app/node_modules dist app/dist

releases.body:
### Patches 

- Don't try downloading immediately if CLI is broken: 78e64d50f8d0719a0b92e15520bf3dd183cfaad2
- Use old mechanism for determining binary location: 9b921e0a27d95734c684c4d954fa78c3a468bf72

### Patches 

- Fixed automatic CLI updates: d181d634103a194a25b2e3ea2f7cf430b99ec3b6

### Minor Changes 

- Automatically move to `Applications` directory: 4cb4139dd21eaa04b770ec9d93b94b324cd171d2
- Force a CLI update if `now -v` fails: 393ea3e0be9b511662e4040fff19530e957ac8dd
- Provide immediate feedback for login form: 904f28c31d011f0a9fde82f4aa5b71125781975b

### Patches 

- Removed unused import: 50f11432f9f783244bff20e81d30d284b1b97ffe
- Use `semver` for comparing the binary versions: cdb6805a2696ad65d93bf9325fecfe8a5069fe83
- Handle new version format of CLI: 8369c4ae2687a377e70c9c11c97d0e6788be9c51
- Use `which` to locate CLI: 9d6731c99d5e05a39db15010ad569240e769dc72
- Also use `semver` package in renderer: e15ec8dcd7ef76191270af031537bc3ede4ee71f
- Don't overwrite development version of CLI: 00cece377b85b1e1c09b337a217bddc728d41654
- No need to tell greenkeeper about the emails: 420a36d1b6c548d7a37d53b652826c4838b5ea32
- Pinned dependencies: d7c6d35540f74d375bcc8543ae413c6f19967d0b
- Bumped dependencies to latest version: 8092402bac754b8df0e0c7649feb58127160d455
- Ignore `.hg` directory when deploying: 94d971e0bade3f295a1b3740567ff65d683b250c
- Restart binary installation if setting permissions fails: 96eb09ec4c2960dcc22dfaf3418659bac0607824
- Use `which-promise` instead of `which`: 6a2535c33597c7b27598c1b2c8afcc2e12843f2e
- Don't ask for move if in development mode: 1c75144f36761eb80c50dbdc2aefecb5be28be41
- Run linting before commit: bc940c6d6c171719a7e07b5a7810e8bc45d6049e

### Patches 

- If binary update failed, abort it: 0445280eb10425d8aebefdcc4248149e4917c4fe
- Moved `ox` rules to `package.json`: 864c727162a167ff138a63b61d4a0f1e1dacdfc3
- Pinned `serve` to the latest version: 6490a3d46b6e5e1c9384397136cd44e70bb6f456
- Stop collecting uncaught exceptions: 6f4d220de3d571bbde874872a9d60d6839f1244b

### Patches 

- Bumped `serve` (leads to much faster static deployments - [more](https://twitter.com/notquiteleo/status/826174394015715328)): 2ecb54c4b5544d291f5fa071662b8102a3db8919

### Patches 

- Make author list look good: 7bf6798f2de08edf81c3dd985f5155d479aea359

### Minor Changes 

- Added [support for Windows](https://zeit.co/blog/now-desktop-windows)  : #242

### Patches 

- Use the correct binary for testing on each platform: 1057c8600a845e0c183781f76c4c6d86be8e9515
- Tell Travis to run the `dist` task: da4d838fd13424ffa54ad34a3ccc4956a8a08bea
- Add Windows cert: 8612d0ab673d953cfce920deac3ed39da10b546f

### Credits 

Huge thanks to @matheuss for his help!

### Minor Changes 

- Support `~/bin` in addition to `/usr/local/bin` directory: 437c85141eb8daaa7e930bf827c4d6b7e16751e0

### Patches 

- Fix auto-updates for the CLI: #239

### Credits 

Huge thanks to @rauchg for his help!

### Patches
- No `version` property required: e4dadaffed664a52361e87f11316f199dd25f778
- Removed `.editorconfig` file (because it's old): d48809728594cfc2dfdbf8a093889f7ffc9f784d
- Pinned `serve` but allowing patches: 8d68e280e79e0972b2e7e3f8189f9e54e0cbc69b

### Patches
- Automatically update date in About window: fcf12af7d64c30efc0cfac745b73fecb5c018016

### Patches
- Use `find` instead of `filter`: #234
- Renamed `tag_name` property to `tag` (makes binary updates work again): #235

### Credits

Huge thanks to @matheuss for his help!

### Patches
- Fixed method for loading latest CLI release: f40be595014021abd56bd25a74eb094461419f62

### Patches
- Update timer in About window for seconds and minutes: b82e8e51e5ec46d3a205d72c5aeab16415fd379f
- Improved mechanism for loading latest CLI release: 228a1242c054e0583380431a21dd36d2f62a6e91
- Fetch latest CLI release from a different microservice: fae50beff9d4514d1b66d9258e122e80ed3b8951
- Compare platform to human-readable format: 65074ed7665cc1e9f8453b6ef13d932448a78ea4

### Credits

Huge thanks to @igorklopov for helping me figure out the best way to retrieve the latest release for the command line interface from our microservices.

### Patches
- Automatically update timer in About window: 3f1251db82ab68997fb9b40bfa35a1e53d2bd8d0

### Patches
- Delete old binary instead of renaming it: 7b217b4b2b8a269a40c50de4bb229ccd9435c225
- Made XO happier: ed2e557e4a0d76ad72a6f302b93208547da9232e
- Unpinned dependencies: 2b9f2721bd2cab0843ed04c786ae46f3641939ad
- Let Travis CI decide whether or not to use sudo: 9d6ceb134a117260d3dac9a7a0021cc6efec8c25

### Patches
- Only add to startup list if first run: 1b0e227ecc30a990de4db06dcc8da7008d3e0736
- Authors added: e65184e4d1b668bf16b47729a536a8a48a0f77d7
- Remove bult-in module from the dependencies: 74ff057ee284669fbaead119ee63527a0862efd3
- Update both the binary and the app itself on startup: 1be6e5222cefad47a0e8fee9ad97eef56b10870e
- Removed terminal indicator: ef94a3b0d9441488ac2a529690f3d320f3709b45

### Patches
- Removed twitter names from "About" window: a3298e3
- Make logo in "About" window link to our company site: a32ce87
- Fixed a few syntactic errors: ac6537f
- Correct product name (and description) added to intro: ffb4c4a and 2ec1a58
- Improved text for CLI section: 8851bea and c20c38f
- Better description (and new title) for success section: 397225f and 521bfff
- Added `@me.com` to list of email suffixes: 0d51818

### Patches
- From now on, the "About" window will show the correct release date: d2cc0dc and 7ef59a8
- Adjusted URL of product page: dfe345c

### Patches
- Don't fail for cross-platform releases of the CLI: f6efd79 and f5925c5
- The "list" package got renamed to "serve": 7b7f860
- Bumped dependencies to the latest version: 051a201, a1823ce, bd44375 and f4739f6
- Make auto updater ready for cross-platform support: 5f90349

### Patches
- Now checking for CLI updates every 15 minutes (instead of 25): 07d5a6e
- Created a proxy for all CLI releases to make sure no API limit errors occur: 7a4f945
- Made [XO](https://github.com/sindresorhus/xo) even happier by removing another file rule: 9193146

### Patches
- Renamed GitHub repository to "now-desktop" (more explicit): 7757520, 11af7a9 and c8778b0
- Don't end up in an endless error loop: 5e7ae71 and 6c044b3
- Updated dependencies to the latest version: 7ec4018 and 1d044a3
- Added instructions for installing using [Homebrew Cask](https://caskroom.github.io/): f6ed73c
- The name of the CLI repository changed as well: badf5eb
- Forward users to `/app` instead of `/now` on the homepage: 8be035d

### Minor Changes
- Added a security token to the login/signup flow, which enables users to ensure that the mail they've received came from us (not from someone else): c30a684 and 68a8cb6

### Patches
- Focus tutorial when binary installation completes: https://github.com/zeit/now-app/issues/116
- Made the buttons adapt to the style of the website: 518b3b6
- Immediately ask user for his password when installing the binary, in case that no node binary exists within the user's binary directory: 9bc9e712f99f7ca2f1b867527b7962ecacc9d192
- Made sure that dependencies in `/app` get pinned automatically: aa013f7
- Only hide dock icon on macOS: f6fe468
- Implemented a more reliable way for finding out the platform: 425f353 and 379a39d
- Only show vertical scrollbar in about window (not the horizontal one): 4a3326b
- Fixed a few typos in the code: https://github.com/zeit/now-app/pull/146
- Bumped dependencies to the latest version: e64b6eb, cb2f655 and 53f5c5b
- Converted the homepage link in `README.md` into a real one: 04c8214a40ed45a0ad26f50332c81f3fdcb173ef

### Patches
- Resolve .jsx and .json in renderer: f1aeaacef4dbc1a3264f0f1ddf4a8b967c6cdc07
- We're checking for updates every 5 minutes (comment adjusted): b38f1c7f6d537f8ca7c05717010f55d4ee97de3b

### Minor Changes

In order to understand how our users are interacting with our application (which allows us to prioritize certain features over others), we're now collecting **anonymised** usage data and information about the system on which the application is running (like the platform, CPU architecture and memory).

We're using [Mixpanel](http://mixpanel.com) to analyse them. Also be sure that we'll never share them with anyone else!

### Patches
- Use `Set` and `Map` instead of plain Arrays and Objects: 025252a and 5b4967b
- Started using `.jsx` extension for JSX files: 8fdd27b
- Webpack is now resolving SVG files just like any other code file: 41ae136
- Pinned dependencies to a fixed version: 0a9ef68
- Removed the "appdmg" dependency (wasn't being used): https://github.com/zeit/now-app/issues/110
- Updated all dependencies to the latest release: 3cf784c

This release fixes [a small bug](https://github.com/zeit/now-app/issues/102) introduced by the last update: 

Babel missed a single `await` keyword and didn't transform it into a generator (and since node sadly doesn't support `await` yet, our users received an error).

### Patches
- Deployments will now be ordered by date: https://github.com/zeit/now-app/issues/96
- Moved action for removing deployments into separate file: 67d62aca42ce401d257f4cc6fa53c8f3ca567f93
- When deleting a deployment, it will now be removed from the cache. Before this change, the application simply reloaded the whole cache (which took much longer): https://github.com/zeit/now-app/issues/90
- Now loading the repository banner from our GitHub org (instead of imgur): 49e25e9
- Fixed a bug that prevented the app from creating temporary directories: b076a10
- The About window now uses the same mechanism as the other windows for toggling the highlight state of the tray icon:  6f70e25
- Fixed a typo in deployment deletion error message: https://github.com/zeit/now-app/pull/82
- Made the About window unminimizable: https://github.com/zeit/now-app/pull/89
- Now showing the app icon when asking the user for permissions: dc4a4ee and 1e84fd4
- Better names for source directories: 14c3c75
- When copying files over to a temporary directory when sharing, no error will be thrown. Rather than that, the app will just go on with the rest of the files and share successfully: 80f4739
- Fixed a typo in the binary section of the tutorial: https://github.com/zeit/now-app/pull/99
- If setting binary permissions fails, the user will be asked for his password and the app will try it executing the action again as root user: https://github.com/zeit/now-app/issues/83
- Enable the user to quit the app even when all windows are open: 8898ba7
- If renaming the existing binary doesn't work, the app won't throw an error (the existing binary will get overwritten either way when the user installs ours): https://github.com/zeit/now-app/issues/80
- Renamed "micro-list" to "list": a4dc6a3

### Patches
- Indicate that the current release only supports macOS: f2b6d9a
- Automatically launch after login: 6856945 and d1a3802
- The tutorial didn't show up after the user logged out: d455c10
- Create the config file after logging in (if it exists, extend it): 78c4755, 4e17f69 and b3acfe1
- Make video start with a black screen: d32a4d1

### Patches
- Capitalize window title properly: 60cc539
- Use correct URL for checking when a version was released: f581a8e

### Patches
- Load the correct local version tag when checking for updates: a8d537d
- Check for updates every 5 minutes (decreased from every 30 minutes): 6834d15
- Quit app before installing update: 22b783b
- Now showing the right click menu even when logged in: 498a3ff

### Patches
- Now showing a much cooler device name in ZEIT's dashboard: 4200e35 and f281bf6
- Made the video's texts much more pregnant: fa28362
- Prevents the tutorial window from flickering after revoking the token in the dashboard: 3f80ff1
- The "About" window now shows how old the release on your device is: aa1ab82
- Much smarter logo for tutorial intro ( to @evilrabbit): e9caf0b
- If an error occurs in the auto updater, it will now get swallowed: 4868cd8

### Minor Changes
- Now grouping deployments by their name: 2ccea1d, c478c1b and c53b583
- After logging out, your `.now.json` will now be resetted automatically: 492adb3
- You'll now see a notification after now(1) got updated: 53d1b26 and 9407afb
- When logging in, the application will log you into the CLI as well: 1718724
- After downloading an update, the app will now be restarted automatically (but only if the application isn't busy with doing something for you): https://github.com/zeit/now-app/issues/79

### Patches
- When checking if the binary already exists, we don't resolve symlinks: d868283
- The app will now check for broken files/symlinks while deploying: 7bce0b2
- You'll now always be able to use your keyboard for navigating the tutorial slider: 1e04c4b
- If the local version of now(1) is older than the latest release, the application will simply treat is as not being existent (which leads to an overwrite): db51973
- When deleting a deployment while it's still uploading, the upload will be stopped: d879941
- The user will only get logged out automatically if the server returns a 403 error while the application is trying to refresh the internal cache: 4978ce5
- The main process will now be responsible for opening the context menu after login: https://github.com/zeit/now-app/issues/74
- We made the video much slower, so that you can easier read its contents: 278017c
- Replaced ZEIT's logo in the tutorial with now's: 81e84df
- Instead of throwing an error, the application will simply do nothing if downloading the latest binary fails (the GitHub API has a limit) and try it again later: 08cbdb6
- If an error occurs, the application will crash (instead of running in a broken state): 0152995

### Patches
- Quitting the app while both windows are open is now possible: ca7c12f
- Correct window titles (these show up when a window gets minimized to the dock): eac534b
- Hover state for social links in "About" window added: 145b4fb
- Now only one package.json file is responsible for the version tag: 65b61bb and 6abe887
- Instead of just showing "(1w ago)", the "About" window will now diplay "(latest)" text to the version tag as long as we're not able to retrieve data from GitHub's public API: ceda611
Hello, world!
